full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Tender Title: Study of the biological environment – Weirs rehabilitation in the Lake Saint-Pierre archipelago

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a consultant to conduct a comprehensive environmental assessment of the biological environment in the Lake Saint-Pierre archipelago's weirs. This assessment will be conducted as part of a weirs rehabilitation project to ensure that it does not cause significant adverse environmental effects.

The assessment shall be comprehensive, rigorous, and of similar scope and detail to those required for designated projects. The consultant shall design and develop the necessary complementary studies to support the analysis of the project's effects on Valued Environmental Components (VECs) and to promote the adoption of mitigation measures adapted to the project.

The baseline study, which includes a literature review, has already been conducted and consists of three sub-studies on the physical, biological, and human environment. The consultant shall also take into account the results of a fish habitat characterization and mapping study conducted in 2022.

The purpose of the characterization was to document the characteristics of fish habitats upstream and downstream of each weir (local area) and to provide a reference state for comparison purposes in the event of any environmental follow-up. The consultant shall provide the results of this study following the awarding of the contract.

The successful consultant shall undertake the required studies and assessments to ensure that the weirs rehabilitation project does not have significant adverse environmental effects. The consultant shall also develop a comprehensive report to support the environmental assessment.

The estimated duration of the contract is approximately 2 years, and the expected ending date is March 30, 2025. The contract award notice was published on July 14, 2023, and the selection criteria is based on the lowest price.

* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (except NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR), Canada
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 14, 2023, at 13:00:00
